body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Elijah Hernandez. May I ask for your name, please?

Hi Elijah. My name is Margaret Cook.

It's nice to meet you, Margaret. How can I assist you today?

I'm trying to understand your pricing for the piano lessons. I'm a bit confused with the different packages.

I’d be happy to help clarify that for you. Could you tell me which package you're interested in?

I'm looking at the beginner's package.

The beginner's package includes eight lessons per month and is priced at one two zero per lesson. Could you also provide me with your contact number, Margaret, so I can send you detailed information?

Sure, my number is five five five eight one two three four five six.

Thank you, Margaret. Is there anything else you would like to know?

No, that's all the information I needed.

Great. Thank you for your time, Margaret. If you have any more questions, feel free to contact us. Have a wonderful day!
